shotgun.name: Model 2x12
shotgun.effect:
Buck Shot: 80 dam out to 3m, 65 out to 10m, 50 out to 20m
Double-Barrel/Break-Barrel. Full action to reload. Each mag pouch in a piece of armor holds 8 shells.

shotgun.name: Hunting Shotgun
shotgun.effect:
Buck Shot: 80 dam out to 3m, 65 out to 10m, 50 out to 20m.
Slug: 60 dam out to 50m.
Half action to rack. See Basic Rules:actions

shotgun.name: Over/Under
shotgun.effect:
Buck Shot: 80 dam out to 3m, 65 out to 10m, 50 out to 20m.
Due to the nature of the Over / Under, you can load both Buck and Slug at the 
same time. Both barrels can be fired at the same time, at a +10% miss chance 
penalty. Reload DC 25%, Full Action reload time. Each mag pouch in a peice of armor holds 8 shells.

shotgun.name: MK900
shotgun.effect: Buck Shot: 80 dam out to 3m, 65 out to 10m, 50 out to 20m.

heavy weapon.name: XM-545 Minigun
heavy weapon.effect:
Reqires Strength of 7 to carry.
5.45 x 39 mm belt; 
Requires 1 full action of spin-up time.
Supporting Fire. No optics, barrel attachments or extended mags.

heavy weapon.name: Ultralight Autocannon
heavy weapon.effect:
Requires strength 6 to carry.
4 rounds, 20mm vicinity detonating HE rounds.
75 explosive damage, 40 shrapnel 1m adjacent.
Damages vehicles. No optics or barrel attachments.
Clips cost $200 each

heavy weapon.name: AA-29 Personal Flack Cannon
heavy weapon.effect:
Requires strength 6 to carry
180 dam out to 3m, 80 out to 10m, 20 out to 20m.
6 rounds, Deathmetal custom flack rounds
Each shot into a door reduces the DC of kicking down that door by 65. If the DC becomes 0, the door is blown open. No optics or barrel attachments. 0% chance to miss airborne targets.
Clips cost $120 each
